Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1976...
Injured on 4/23/1978 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1979 (Going to PIL: LF D. Brown, 3B M. Tate, P J. Santana. Going to PIT: 1B J. Castle)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1980, off Sal Aranda (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/1980, off Richard Rummel (LYN)...
Injured on 9/17/1985 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1989, hitting .625 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1989, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
